original_text: For so the Lord said unto me, I will take my rest, and I will consider in my dwelling place like a clear heat upon herbs, and like a cloud of dew in the heat of harvest.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 내가 나의 처소에서 조용히 감찰함이 쬐이는 일광 같고 가을 더위에 운무 같도다

sentences.original_text: For so the Lord said unto me
and I will consider in my dwelling place
like a clear heat upon herbs
and like a cloud of dew in the heat of harvest
